adHeader: Your Santa Rosa Realtor with a smile!
adDetails: Are you ready to buy or sell a home? If you are and you want a Realtor who will always tell you the truth, return your phone calls promptly and keep you informed at all times, call me. I will be happy to meet with you and talk about your needs. I have experience buying and selling homes for my clients in Santa Rosa...call me today! Need a current market analysis on your home, info. about your neighborhood? Help with a short-sale? Looking for purchase an investment property? Kim Greeny is able to save you "Green" with a reduced Realtor fee....Call her today!
